page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content: The text has ben compiled by the staff and pupils of Sidlesham C.P. School. The information was collected by the first ,second, and third year junior children assisted by governors parents and teachers. Many people in the village gave information by letter,telephone or in person. There are only three classes in the school now, seventy children in all. The teaching is done by two full time staff and a half time teacher who shares a class with the headteacher. Children are taught in classes which contain two year groups.
